channel.title: ESPN: The B.S. Report with Bill Simmons
channel.itunes:author: ESPN
channel.description: ESPN.com and ESPN the Magazine's Bill Simmons talks about his favorite things in sports: the Celtics, the Red Sox, his fantasy team and more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: ESPN.com and ESPN the Magazine's Bill Simmons talks about his favorite things in sports: the Celtics, the Red Sox, his fantasy team and more.
channel.itunes:summary: ESPN.com and ESPN the Magazine's Bill Simmons talks about his favorite things in sports: the Celtics, the Red Sox, his fantasy team and more.

item.itunes:author: ESPN: The B.S. Report
